page.title: 07THE COMMUNITY POLICE.
page.content: Mr. Derek Robinson is our community policeman.The first thing that he has to do is to tell the police station that he is starting work. He's got this little radio and that's how he tells them. Mr. Robinson works eight hours a day going round our estate. At night he goes to the Post Office, to Urswick Road Stores, to the Co-op and the Swimming Baths to make sure everything is locked up safely.One day he saw some boys glue sniffing behind the Urswick Road Stores. Our other community policeman is Mr.McClelland. They tell people off for playing on the road or riding a bike at night without lights. They try to keep our estate peaceful and happy. RACHEL aged 9.
